channel.title: Custom Shop [Delta]
channel.description:
Well I am pretty much out of ideas on this as I haven't tried it until now...but we will go on.
I am currently making a dungeoneering shop to my new minigame.
I am trying to make it run through tokens and not coins.
I have changed the Slot to Slot3(my tokens).
And when I try to buy items you have to have coins and tokens or you cannot buy it.
Does anyone have and Idea?
Some pictures below:
[IMG]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/1383/110729122215.png[/img] [IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/6686/110731004404.png[/img]

Post your shopid coding?
Edit: Try following this guide and finding your problem: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,450229.msg3302622.html#msg3302622
